001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003/**
004 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 8/12/2015.
005 */
006public class Coord implements java.io.Serializable {
007    private static final long serialVersionUID = 300L;
008    public int x;
009    public int y;
010
011    public Coord()
012    {
013        this(0, 0);
014    }
015    public Coord(int x, int y)
016    {
017        this.x = x;
018        this.y = y;
019    }
020    public Coord(Coord other)
021    {
022        this.x = other.x;
023        this.y = other.y;
024    }
025
026    public Coord getLocation()
027    {
028        return new Coord(x, y);
029    }
030    public void translate(int x, int y)
031    {
032        this.x += x;
033        this.y += y;
034    }
035    public void setLocation(int x, int y)
036    {
037        this.x = x;
038        this.y = y;
039    }
040    public void setLocation(double x, double y)
041    {
042        this.x = (int)(x + 0.5);
043        this.y = (int)(y + 0.5);
044    }
045    public void setLocation(Coord co)
046    {
047        this.x = co.x;
048        this.y = co.y;
049    }
050    public void move(int x, int y)
051    {
052        this.x = x;
053        this.y = y;
054    }
055    public double distance(double x2, double y2)
056    {
057        return Math.sqrt((x2 - x) * (x2 - x) + (y2 - y) * (y2 - y));
058    }
059    public double distance(Coord co)
060    {
061        return Math.sqrt((co.x - x) * (co.x - x) + (co.y - y) * (co.y - y));
062    }
063    public double distanceSq(double x2, double y2)
064    {
065        return (x2 - x) * (x2 - x) + (y2 - y) * (y2 - y);
066    }
067    public double distanceSq(Coord co)
068    {
069        return (co.x - x) * (co.x - x) + (co.y - y) * (co.y - y);
070    }
071
072    public int getX() {
073        return x;
074    }
075
076    public void setX(int x) {
077        this.x = x;
078    }
079
080    public int getY() {
081        return y;
082    }
083
084    public void setY(int y) {
085        this.y = y;
086    }
087
088    public String toString()
089    {
090        return "Coord (x " + x + ", y " + y + ")";
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public int hashCode() {
095        int hash = 7;
096        hash = 113 * hash + x;
097        hash = 113 * hash + y;
098        return hash;
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public boolean equals(Object o) {
103        if (o instanceof Coord) {
104            Coord other = (Coord) o;
105            return x == other.x && y == other.y;
106        } else {
107            return false;
108        }
109    }
110
111}
